pr_title: add profile releaseCN to use local node&cnpm

timeline.bodyText: release and releaseCN is same, shall we keep only one?
timeline.author: cherrylzhao

timeline.bodyText: if we make activation=true distribution will happed every time
timeline.author: cherrylzhao

timeline.bodyText: if we make activation=true distribution will happed every time, I think we should delete it
timeline.author: cherrylzhao

timeline.bodyText: The indent of xml is incorrect.
